pkgmetadata.longdescription: Running Interrupted Time Series Analysis // Two functions for running and then post-estimating an Interrupted Time Series Analysis model. This is a solution for running time series analyses on temporally short data. See English (2019) 'The its.analysis R package - Modelling short time series data' https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=3398189 for an overview of the method.
